```{r setup, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("tidyverse")
```

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# https://data.oecd.org/healthres/nurses.htm
d24_data_raw <- readr::read_csv("DP_LIVE_25042022104035432.csv")
```

```{r}
# data wrangling
d24_data <- d24_data_raw |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  filter(location == "USA") |>
  select(time, value) |>
  mutate(label_text = paste0("In the year ", time, ",\n", "there were ", value, " nurses per 1000 inhabitants"),
         label_bool = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# we can try to focus on a few locations
d24_data$label_bool[d24_data$value == min(d24_data$value)] <- TRUE
# d24_data$label_bool[d24_data$value == median(d24_data$value)] <- TRUE
d24_data$label_bool[d24_data$value == max(d24_data$value)] <- TRUE
d24_data$label_bool[d24_data$time == min(d24_data$time)] <- TRUE
d24_data$label_bool[d24_data$time == max(d24_data$time)] <- TRUE

d24_data_for_labels <- d24_data |>
  filter(label_bool)
```

```{r}
# Today, I am going to try to put the title, subtitle, and caption in a text box(es)
# https://wilkelab.org/ggtext/reference/geom_textbox.html
d24_data_for_textbox <- data.frame(
  x = 2012,
  y = 5,
  label = "**Nurses in the United States**\n30 Day Chart Challenge, Day 25: Trends",
  color = "white",
  fill = "darkblue"
)
```


```{r}
d24_plot <- d24_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = time, y = value)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", color = "black", fill = "red") +
  # geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE,
  #             color = "darkblue", size = 4) +
  geom_label(aes(x = time, y = 0, label = time),
             color = "white",
             fill = "darkblue") +
  ggrepel::geom_label_repel(aes(x = time, y = value, 
                                label = label_text),
                            color = "white",
                            data = d24_data_for_labels,
                            fill = "darkblue") +
  ggtext::geom_textbox(aes(x = x, y = y, label = label),
                       color = "white",
                       data = d24_data_for_textbox,
                       fill = "darkblue") +
  ylim(0, 20) +
  labs(title = "",
       subtitle = "",
       caption = "Data Source: OECD",
       x = "",
       y = "") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none",
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "black"),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank())

ggimage::ggbackground(d24_plot, "nurses_-_grayscale.jpg")
```
